scripts.prod: rimraf build/* && eslint ./src/**/*.ts && npm run build
scripts.build: tsc && rollup --silent -c rollup.config.js && rollup --silent -c ./src/cloud/rollup.config.js && rollup --silent -c ./src/document/rollup.config.js && copyfiles -a ./src/types/lib/* -u 1 ./publish
scripts.dev-publish: npm publish --dry-run && cd publish && cd types && npm publish --dry-run && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../module && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../node && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../document && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../cloud && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../compress && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../image && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../watch && cd ../file-manager && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.prod-publish: npm publish && cd publish && cd types && npm publish && cd ../module && npm publish && cd ../node && npm publish && cd ../document && npm publish && cd ../cloud && npm publish && cd ../compress && npm publish && cd ../image && npm publish && cd ../watch && npm publish && cd ../file-manager && npm publish
